Talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_01>Oh, hello. <sp:5:0:0>Welcome in.<sp:0:4:0>Those old coots finally made up, <sp:5:0:0>so I have
a strong stock of ingredients for sale
again.
Except...there is one little problem.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><clr:0000><snd:Sad_01>Bird eggs<clr:ffff> are still in short supply around
here.<sp:0:4:0>The Cuccos still lay their eggs every
<clr:0000>morning<clr:ffff>, of course, <sp:5:0:0>but they just started
<clr:0000>laying them in a new spot<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_01>I tried following them once to find their
new nesting place, <sp:5:0:0>but I'm not as quick
on my feet as I once was.<sp:5:1:0>
Given how well our bird eggs sell, <sp:5:0:0>I
usually like having <clr:0000>10<clr:ffff> or so on hand,
so I can easily restock them.<sp:5:0:0>
But oh, well.
Talk1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sad>I'm sorry. <sp:5:0:0>I should be able to replenish my
stock of everything other than <clr:0000>bird eggs<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>A ways back, the Cuccos changed where
they <clr:0000>lay their eggs<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>They run off to their
new nest whenever <clr:0000>morning<clr:ffff> comes.<sp:5:1:0>
Oh, but how I wish I even had <clr:0000>10<clr:ffff> to sell...
Talk1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sad>I'm sorry. <sp:5:0:0>I should be able to replenish my
stock of everything other than <clr:0000>bird eggs<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>They're a popular product, <sp:5:0:0>so I wish
I could do something about that.<sp:0:4:0>If only I had <clr:0000>10<clr:ffff> of them...<sp:5:0:0> Oh yes, then
I could restock whenever I needed to.
Talk1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_01>Thank you for being such a devoted
customer.<sp:5:0:0>

Now that those old grouches made up,<sp:5:0:0>
I should be able to replenish my stock
right away.<sp:5:1:0>
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01><clr:ffff>Though I suppose I'll be out of <clr:0000>bird eggs<clr:ffff>
for a while yet...<sp:5:1:0>

The Cuccos still lay their eggs every
<clr:0000>morning<clr:ffff>, of course, <sp:5:0:0>but they've recently
started <clr:0000>laying them in a new spot<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think_01>I tried following them once to find their
new nesting place, <sp:5:0:0>but I'm not as quick
on my feet as I used to be.
Those eggs sell very well for us, <sp:5:0:0>so even
<clr:0000>10 <clr:ffff>or so would be a huge help.
Talk1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>I know it's not much, but that should
still be more than you'd normally get.
Talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sad>I'm sorry.<sp:5:0:0> I do have things other than
<clr:0000>bird eggs<clr:ffff> in stock.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>A ways back, the Cuccos changed where
they <clr:0000>lay their eggs<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>They run off to their
new nest whenever <clr:0000>morning<clr:ffff> comes.<sp:5:1:0>
I usually like to have <clr:0000>10 <clr:ffff>eggs to sell,<sp:5:0:0>
but there's not much chance of that...<sp:5:1:0>
Talk1012: <sp:3:0:2:0801>Here, <sp:5:0:0>let me just put these on display.
Talk1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Tired_01>There, now both my shelves and my heart
are full. <sp:5:0:0>Please come again!
Talk1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Dear me, apologies for going on and on
about my old worries...
Talk1006: <sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Oh! You really brought me 10 bird eggs?
Talk1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>What a kindhearted thing to do.
Thank you so very much.

Of course, I'm not about to take them off
your hands without paying.
